articles.title: Newly discovered Australian beetle almost mistaken for bird poo - BBC.com
articles.description: An Australian researcher spotted the white furry bug by chance while camping within rainforest.
articles.content:
The newly discovered bug on a leaf
What's red, black, and hairy all over? A new species of bug discovered in Australia, dubbed by some as a "punk beetle" for its shaggy white locks.
